title: Happy Birthday, Hanamaru-san!
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>Hanamaru-san, happy birthday!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Thank you, zura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Here’s your present.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Wow! May I open it now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yes, go ahead.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>......It’s a book cover, zura! Wow~ It’s leather... This is pretty high-end for Maru... Huh? There’s writing on it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>There was a text engraving service when I bought this book cover. The quote is from—<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Lewis Caroll! It says in English, “Everything is funny, if you can laugh at it.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yup! No matter what happens, don’t forget to smile!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru will be strong enough to get through anything with a smile on her face with this!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
